| HistoryText             = The '''Lords of Wyrd''' were [[Glossary:Sorcerer Supreme|Sorcerers Supremes]] from [[Beyond the Purple Veil|beyond]] the [[Purple Veil (Dimension)|Purple Veil]].<!-- {{r|Doctor Strange Vol 4 3}} -->

They were some of the many Sorcerers Supreme executed by the [[Empirikul (Earth-616)|Empirikul]] during their Inquisition to purge all realms of magic. Their corpses was hung in a tree in [[Fandazar Foo]] along with those of other victims, and they was found by [[Stephen Strange (Earth-616)|Doctor Strange]] and [[Wong (Earth-616)|Wong]].{{r|Doctor Strange Vol 4 3}}

==Powers==
<!-- The were Lords of Wyrd [[Glossary:Sorcerer Supreme|Sorcerers Supremes]] of their own rights.{{r|Doctor Strange Vol 4 3}} -->
Given their name, it is plausible that the Lords of Wyrd practiced the Wyrd Ways of the Weaver (or [[Weaver Magic]]).
